arbitrationCost(bytes).details: Compute the cost of arbitration. It is recommended not to increase it often, as it can be highly time and gas consuming for the arbitrated contracts to cope with fee augmentation.

params._extraData: Can be used to give additional info on the dispute to be created.

changeCourtJurorFee(uint96,uint256).details: Changes the `feeForJuror` property value of a specified court.

params._feeForJuror: The new value for the `feeForJuror` property value.

changeFastbridge(address,uint256).details: Changes the fastBridge, useful to increase the claim deposit.

params._fastBridgeReceiver: The address of the new fastBridge.
params._gracePeriod: The duration to accept messages from the deprecated bridge (if at all).

relayRule(address,bytes32,uint256,addres.notice: Relay the rule call from the home gateway to the arbitrable.
